name: Website
body:
My name is Kyle Melvin. I am a junior computer information systems major. I am currently looking for multiple options for internships around the country including CSX in Jacksonville Florida and Parsons Corporation in Washington DC.

I currently have Experience with Java, Java JDBC database programming, HTML, Python, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, Access, PowerPoint), Software Version Control with Git and GitHub, SQL, MySQL database administration, MySQL Workbench, Linux, Linux System Administration, Vi, Agile, Scrum, Reactive Web Design, Bootstrap Web Framework, CSS, and Eclipse IDE.

I am involved around campus with different things like Alpha Kappa Lambda Social Fraternity where I serve as the recruitment chairmen. I am also an intramural referee.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
